title: React 16 Known Regressions
body:
Going to track them here since website issues are creating a lot of noise.

### Fixed in Master

- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10909 Extra variable in UMDs, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/10935
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10831 `null` instead of component stack in a warning, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/10915
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10865 Crash when hydrating on IE11 in development, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/10921
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10987 `tabIndex` getting lost on SVG, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11033
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11017 Crash rendering into shadow root, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11037
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10938 We should allow running test and shallow renderers in production again, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11112.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10598 SSR doesn't separate unrelated text nodes in some cases, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11109.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11103 SSR: ReactDOM client and server handling newlines differently causing mismatch warnings, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11119.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11156 Peer dependencies warn for beta?
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10906 `onMouseEnter` fires twice after a child is added, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11164.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11152 `onMouseEnter` fires when hovered over a child, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11164.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11161 Shallow renderer doesnâ€™t merge multiple `setState()` calls in `componentWillMount` correctly, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11167.
- [x] SSR throws an obscure error on bad `style` prop, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11173.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11172 IE11 loses textarea placeholder on first render, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11177.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10772 False positive warning when rehydrating camel-case SVG tag names, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11174.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/10993 False positive warning when rehydrating `<noscript>`, fixed in https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11157.
- [x] https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11159 `autoFocus` doesn't work with SSR.

### New Features Added in Master
- [x] Allow `on` attribute (but not other `on...` attributes). https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11153
- [x] Allow explicitly shallow ignore of hydration warning. https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/11126
